title: Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation
notes: Works nearly flawlessly, except lighting is broken, so the game is in fullbright. Seems to be a bug also in WINE, https://bugs.winehq.org/show_bug.cgi?id=31260 ; Seems a workaround should be to use software renderer, however, I was unable to launch the game with that option selected. Note: you can add -setup to the launch options to launch with the config window.

title: Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation
notes: When you launched it you obtain only a black screen. In fact there is a setup window behind this black screen. Just "enter" and the game launches. No keyboard.

title: Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation
notes: Game opens a black screen with a "settings"/"launcher" window behind it, however it is difficult to select this "settings"/"launcher" window... If one does manage to select the settings or "launcher" window though (using alt+tab and "enter"), it is still pointless because keyboard or mouse input is not detected.

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) Haswell Mobile x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: cant reach the launcher - hidden behind black window
